titles.title: Relating to the death of the Honorable Daniel K. Inouye, a Senator from the State of Hawaii.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 839.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/19/2012--Passed House without amendment. Declares that the House of Representatives has heard with profound sorrow and deep regret the announcement of the death of the Honorable Daniel K. Inouye, a Senator from Hawaii. Declares that when the House adjourns on December 19, 2012, it stand adjourned as a further mark of respect to the memory of Senator Inouye.
